panelDefaultLocation.title: Panel location
panelDefaultLocation.description: Default location into which to open the panel

statusBarLocation.description: Set the location for the status bar error display

compact.description: Reduce the amount of vertical space required by listed messages

hideIfEmpty.description: Close the pane item as soon as no errors exist. The UI's state is restored whenever further annotations are found.

autoOpen.description: Automatically toggle the linting errors panel if a new error is found and the panel is not open.
